disclaimer.junte-se: Join us to boost culture and events in the periphery! Get in touch now to become a VivaPerifa partner.
disclaimer.impulsionar-texto: Increase the impact of your event on the community with VivaPerifa! Our platform offers powerful tools to promote and highlight your event, reaching the right audience and boosting your visibility.  Join us to take your initiative to the next level!

organizador.perfil: With extensive experience in event planning and execution, I am an event producer dedicated to turning visions into unforgettable experiences. My passion for creating unique and memorable moments drives me to continuously innovate, ensuring that each event is distinctive and customized to meet my clients' expectations.

depoimento.titulo: they liked it, you will too!
depoimento.descricao1: VivaPerifa is amazing! I found several cultural events in my region that I didn't even know existed. It's a platform that strengthens local culture.
depoimento.descricao2: As an event organizer, VivaPerifa was a great choice to promote our initiatives in the periphery. The platform is easy to use and helped us reach a wider audience.
depoimento.descricao3: VivaPerifa is an essential tool for those who want to stay updated on what's happening in the peripheries.
depoimento.descricao4: I love VivaPerifa's inclusive approach! I found diverse events and was able to participate in initiatives I didn't know about before. It's a platform that truly values the community.
depoimento.descricao5: VivaPerifa offers an impressive variety of resources that make the user experience exceptional. It's a platform that truly values the community.
